channel.title: Portal help
channel.description:
im trying to make a portal say when you click on it Are you sure you want to go to the kbd lair?
And then a simple Select an option
Yes or no?
If some one could kindly help?

item.title: Portal help
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

Try this, but you still have to change some stuff.

add in your Client.java where you add object cases…

        case OBJECTID:
            changeText126("Select an Option", 2460);
            changeText126("yes, I would like to go to the KBD lair.", 2461);
            changeText126("No, I don't wanne go to the KBD lair.", 2462);
            sendFrame164(2459);
        break;
   Open clickingmost search case 9157 and add under it

       if (c.objectID == OBJECTID) {
       c.toX = X; or whatever you use to tele
       c.toY = Y; or whatever you use to tele
       c.sM("You're teleported to the KBD-lair."); or whatever you use to send a message
       c.closeAll();
      }

now search case 9158 and under it add

if (objectID == OBJECTID) {
c.closeAll();
}

Read full topic
